title: Igraine the Brave
description: Igraine, who turns twelve tomorrow, dreams of becoming a famous knight. But today, like most days, life at the family castle remains . . . rather boring.Until the nefarious nephew of the baroness-next-door shows up. Greedy Osmund’s got a dastardly plan to capture Pimpernel Castle and steal the singing magic books that belong to Igraine’s mom and dad. Complicating matters, on the eve of the siege her parents misspeak a spell and turn themselves into pigs! ( How inconvenient.)Igraine’s birthday wish has come true, and the challenge is bigger than she ever bargained Will she face her fears and find the courage to save the day–and the books?
author: Cornelia Funke
